ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] thulian claw hype?
ygData.msgSnippet: ahh.. only level 15??  Don t worry about a SoW until level 25ish (if you don t already have 1hb maxxed you might want to start practicing it occasionally now).
ygData.messageBody:
ahh.. only level 15?? Don't worry about a SoW until level 25ish (if you
don't already have 1hb maxxed you might want to start practicing it
occasionally now). The SoW doesn't start Proc'ing until level 28. Enjoy
the claw! Wish I'd had something like that at level 15.

Make sure you work your 1hb skill up. When you're in a group keep a mace or
something in your off-hand (once you have dual wield). By the time you hit
28 you will have maxxed your 1hb and the staff of writhing will be awesome.

~ L

From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] thulian claw hype?


> The staff won't proc for you for a bit I think, keep thiat in mind...
